mapper.insert: insert into waw_user(email, id, pwd, name, phoneNumber) values(#{email},#{id}, #{pwd},#{name},#{phoneNumber})
mapper.select: select name from waw_user where email=#{email} and pwd=#{pwd}
select email from waw_user where name=#{name} and phoneNumber=${phoneNumber}
select pwd from waw_user where email=#{email} and name=#{name} and phoneNumber=#{phoneNumber}
